data.name: Tree of Life: Oddria!
data.detailed_description:
Join our Official Discord


About the Game


Oddria is a Survival Online Game that deals with co-op or competition among players wrecked on a strange island. Gather resources and create useful tools. Build your new home against harsh nature and ancient mysteries.





At the top of the island, fate is calling you.
Is it really a coincidence to be here?




To survive, you must utilize the island's resources.
Such as farming, ranching and fishing.




At night, you will have to protect yourself from zombies who know nothing but death.
Build your own home everywhere for safety and comfort.




Hunt powerful monsters to complete the island's challenges.
Collect their souls to reach the top of the island.




Oddria supports PvP, PvE, and Single Player.
Explore the world the way you want.
(Community Server is also supported so that you can create your own world.)

Are you ready for an adventure?

Are you ready for an adventure?
data.short_description: The journey begins once again. You wake up on a strange island. Now it all depends on your choices. Will you be a kind friend? Or will you be the enemy? All the stories unfold now in the world of Oddria.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
